job description:
• Job Description Data Analyst - Denodo Engineer
Location: McLean, VA
Duration: 11-12 Months

Job Details & Requirements:
  • Should have 5+ years of hands-on experience with Denodo data virtualization
  • Experienced in ETL concepts and tools such as Informatica, SQL, Data Mapping, XML, Webservices
  • Monitor, tune, and administer the Denodo environment
  • Experience in scripting languages like Batch, Shell
  • Experience with integration of data from multiple data sources like DB2, Sybase, Oracle, SQL server
  • Strong with SQL development knowledge for Relational Databases
  • Manage virtual infrastructure. Install, maintain, monitor and tune large enterprise scale virtual deployments.
  • Analyze system, server, application, network and input/output device performance. Perform and test routine system backups and restores.
  • Single point-of-contact for onsite communications, monitoring
  • Experienced in key ETL technologies, Mainframe, SQL Server DB
  • Perform Business and Technical Analysis
  • Designs and develops high quality integration solutions consistent with given requirements
  • Collaborates with other application development teams to design, develop and deploy solutions leveraging the data virtualization tool
  • Supports the definition of, and adherence to, Data Virtualization standards, conventions, principles
  • Work in Agile environment
  • Experience mentoring junior engineers.
Description Proficiency Years' Experience
  • Data Architecture Medium 3 - 5 Years
  • Data Modeling Tools High 5 - 7 Years
